summary: Every model has taken over 5,000 hours of development and 500 hours of assembly

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of Tazio Nuvolari in motorsport history?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He is regarded as one of the greatest racing drivers of all time, known for his successes in the 1930s.
wrong_options: He was a prominent Formula 1 team principal in the 1950s.
He won the first Monaco Grand Prix.
He developed the first aerodynamic car design.

qa_pairs.question: How long did it take to develop each model in the Amalgam Collection?
